tiers.name: Foundation
tiers.description: Build speed, coding fluency, and complexity intuition.

topics.title: Time Complexity & Constraints Analysis
topics.concept: Map constraints (N, Q, value bounds) to feasible complexities and memory limits.
topics.patternRecognition: Start every problem by reading max N/Q then shortlist O(N), O(N log N), O(N^2), etc.
topics.timeComplexity: Decision framework: N<=20 brute force, N<=2e5 linear/log-linear, N<=1e6 linear only.

practiceProblems.name: CF - K-th Not Divisible by n

topics.whenNotToUse: Don't overfit rules; sometimes hidden structure allows faster than naive estimate.
topics.icpcVariations: Constraint triage under pressure with multiple subtasks and mixed data structure costs.

topics.title: Math Basics
topics.concept: Core arithmetic identities, divisibility, factorial growth, logarithms.
topics.patternRecognition: Use when counting, divisibility, overflow, or growth-rate reasoning appears.
topics.timeComplexity: Mostly O(1) math operations; precompute where repeated.
topics.template: long long ceil_div(long long a,long long b){ return (a+b-1)/b; }

practiceProblems.name: UVa - 10190 Divide, But Not Quite Conquer!

topics.whenNotToUse: Avoid pure formula approach when simulation/state transitions dominate.
topics.icpcVariations: Combining modular arithmetic with combinatorics and geometry constraints.

topics.title: GCD / LCM
topics.concept: Use Euclid and gcd properties for divisibility/array reduction.
topics.patternRecognition: Appears in pair divisibility, ratios, fraction simplification.
topics.timeComplexity: gcd O(log min(a,b)); full array O(N log V).
topics.template: long long g=std::gcd(a,b); long long l=a/g*b;
topics.whenNotToUse: Not useful when constraints are positional/ordering without arithmetic relation.
topics.icpcVariations: Batch gcd queries with segment trees and dynamic updates.

topics.title: Modular Arithmetic
topics.concept: Compute under mod safely with inverse/exponentiation.
topics.patternRecognition: Large answer bounds, combinatorics, cyclic behavior.
topics.timeComplexity: powmod O(log p); precompute factorial O(N).
commonMistakes: Using inverse when mod not prime
topics.template: long long modpow(long long a,long long e,long long m){long long r=1%m;while(e){if(e&1)r=r*a%m;a=a*a%m;e>>=1;}return r;}
topics.whenNotToUse: Skip mod if exact ordering/comparison of huge integers is required.
topics.icpcVariations: CRT with non-coprime moduli and Garner-style reconstruction.

topics.title: Prefix Sum
topics.concept: Precompute cumulative sums to answer range queries instantly.
topics.whenNotToUse: Not enough for dynamic updates; use Fenwick/Segment Tree.

topics.title: Two Pointers
topics.concept: Maintain two indices for monotonic windows or pair finding.
topics.patternRecognition: Sorted arrays, subarray constraints, pair sums.
topics.whenNotToUse: If state isn't monotone or depends on non-local history.
topics.icpcVariations: Combine with prefix sums and offline sorting.

topics.title: Sliding Window
topics.concept: Track aggregate over contiguous segment with moving boundaries.
commonMistakes: Not updating window stats on shrink
Overusing map when array frequency works
topics.template: unordered_map<int,int> f; int l=0; for(int r=0;r<n;r++){f[a[r]]++; while(violates){if(--f[a[l]]==0)f.erase(a[l]); l++;}}
topics.whenNotToUse: For arbitrary range queries without contiguous property.
topics.icpcVariations: Window with monotonic deque + lazy deletions.

topics.title: Sorting & Searching
topics.concept: Sort data to unlock binary search/greedy structures.
topics.patternRecognition: Need order statistics, nearest values, intervals.
topics.timeComplexity: Sort O(N log N), queries often O(log N).
topics.whenNotToUse: If online order changes every query (need balanced tree/heap).
topics.icpcVariations: Sort + sweep line for geometry/interval events.

topics.title: Binary Search on Answer
topics.concept: Binary search a monotonic feasibility function over answer space. Convert optimization into decision: can(mid)?
topics.patternRecognition: Look for minimum/maximum value X such that condition holds, and if condition gets easier/harder monotonically with X.
topics.timeComplexity: O(log(range) * checkCost). Typical range up to 1e18 => ~60 iterations.
commonMistakes: Choosing wrong monotonic direction (increasing vs decreasing predicate)
Infinite loops due to bad mid update
Overflow in mid = (l+r)/2 when l,r are large
Using floating search when integer binary search is enough
topics.whenNotToUse: Do not use when feasibility is not monotonic or when ternary/DP/graph shortest path models fit better.
topics.icpcVariations: Parametric search with flow/matching checks, answer compression, and fractional binary search with precision controls.

topics.title: STL Mastery for CP
topics.concept: Master vector, set, map, priority_queue, deque, bitset, algorithms.
topics.timeComplexity: Know each op: set/map O(logN), unordered average O(1).
topics.whenNotToUse: When custom memory pools or specialized DS is required for constants.

topics.title: Recursion & Backtracking
topics.concept: Explore state trees with pruning.

topics.title: Greedy Algorithms

topics.patternRecognition: Exchange argument or cut property visible.
topics.whenNotToUse: If local optimum doesn't imply global.

topics.concept: Prime preprocessing and divisor arithmetic.
topics.template: for(int i=2;i<=n;i++) if(!spf[i]) for(int j=i;j<=n;j+=i) if(!spf[j]) spf[j]=i;

topics.title: Bipartite Matching

icpcPreparation.title: ICPC Regionals Format
icpcPreparation.content: 5-hour contest, one machine, penalty by wrong submissions and solve times; focus on balanced problem spread.

icpcPreparation.title: World Finals Format
icpcPreparation.content: World Finals rewards breadth + depth. Teams must pre-plan role switching and debugging ownership.

icpcPreparation.title: Team Strategy Guide
icpcPreparation.content: Assign roles: fast implementer, theory modeler, debugger. Reevaluate every 45 minutes.

icpcPreparation.title: Contest Psychology
icpcPreparation.content: Avoid tilt loops: after two failed attempts, rotate reviewer. Keep communication concise and factual.

icpcPreparation.title: Debugging Checklist
icpcPreparation.content: Re-check constraints, indexing, corner cases, data type overflow, and monotonic assumptions before resubmit.

icpcPreparation.title: 5-Hour Stamina Plan
icpcPreparation.content: Run weekly 5-hour simulations, split into 90-minute blocks + short hydration/micro-stretch routine.
